name: Avik Ashar
position: Investor @ Artha Venture Fund | Former Founder & Operator

current_company.name: Artha Venture Fund
current_company.title: Investor @ Artha Venture Fund | Former Founder & Operator

experience.title: Principal
experience.description: Artha Venture Fund 1 is a Rs. 225 crore ($33 million) early stage venture capital fund that will invest in 40 revenue stage companies following on in them in the Pre-Series A/Angel & Series A rounds. The fund's investment strategy is built on the experience gained by our Founding Partner from investing in 100+ companies, participating in 150+ funding rounds and delivering top quartile results.Artha Select Fund 1 is a Rs. 450 crore ($55 million) growth stage fund that will invest follow-on capital in companies from Artha Venture Fund 1 and Artha Venture Fund 2
experience.description_html: Artha Venture Fund 1 is a Rs. 225 crore ($33 million) early stage venture capital fund that will invest in 40 revenue stage companies following on in them in the Pre-Series A/Angel & Series A rounds. The fund's investment strategy is built on the experience gained by our Founding Partner from investing in 100+ companies, participating in 150+ funding rounds and delivering top quartile results.Artha Select Fund 1 is a Rs. 450 crore ($55 million) growth stage fund that will invest follow-on capital in companies from Artha Venture Fund 1 and Artha Venture Fund 2

experience.title: Board Observer
experience.description: Everest Fleet is the world's largest Uber fleet partner, with over 18,000 vehicles across CNG and Electric motors, valued at over $400 million. Artha Ventures has been a seed investor in Everest and continued to participate across the growth of the company

experience.title: Board Observer
experience.description: Daalchini is India's leading vending machine operator, with over 2,000 vending machines across 82 cities.Catering to 25% of India's top 100 companies, Daalchini has made an impact across the corporate sector as well as industrial, with machines deployed across corporate plants and factories alike.Clients include Reliance, Amazon, JSW, EY, Samsung and more.Partnered with 200+ brands, managing over a 1000 SKUs, with over 60 items sold a minute, Daalchini is creating a new point of retail distribution for incumbents and challenger brands alike.

experience.title: Board Observer
experience.description: Lemnisk is a leading Customer Data Platform (CDP) solution with a large clientele across the BFSI and Retail industries. With investments from Artha Ventures, Airtel, DSP Group and implementation partnerships across the Middle East, South East Asia and Australia, Lemnisk is a leading provider of martech.Leveraging their AI engine, Ramanujan, they help companies customize their marketing and communications, improving customer experiences, conversions and upsellling.

experience.title: Charter Member
experience.description: Honored to be invited to be a Charter Member for the Singapore chapter of TiE which started in the Silicon Valley in 1992. Today, it is a strong global network with over 60 chapters in 17 countries and over 10,000 members.TiE Singapore is a vibrant eco-system of Asian entrepreneurs, angel investors, venture capitalists and industry professionals. It is a non-profit that inspires entrepreneurs through its training, mentoring and networking programs.TiE Singapore nurtures a productive environment where- Startups can interact and get advice from successful entrepreneurs and industry professionals.- Entrepreneurs can help their peers and benefit from each other's experiences and network with potential investors.- Investors can stay updated on the startups scene in Asia and get introduced the hottest startups and the founder community.- Founders can find a support system through the entire entrepreneurial process and groom into seasoned entrepreneurs.- Seasoned entrepreneurs can give back to the entrepreneurial community through mentoring.
experience.description_html: Honored to be invited to be a Charter Member for the Singapore chapter of TiE which started in the Silicon Valley in 1992. Today, it is a strong global network with over 60 chapters in 17 countries and over 10,000 members.TiE Singapore is a vibrant eco-system of Asian entrepreneurs, angel investors, venture capitalists and industry professionals. It is a non-profit that inspires entrepreneurs through its training, mentoring and networking programs.TiE Singapore nurtures a productive environment where- Startups can interact and get advice from successful entrepreneurs and industry professionals.- Entrepreneurs can help their peers and benefit from each other's experiences and network with potential investors.- Investors can stay updated on the startups scene in Asia and get introduced the hottest startups and the founder community.- Founders can find a support system through the entire entrepreneurial process and groom into seasoned entrepreneurs.- Seasoned entrepreneurs can give back to the entrepreneurial community through mentoring.

experience.title: VC Scout
experience.description: Credit Saison is a Tokyo-listed 30b AUM consumer finance company, and one of the largest credit card issuers in Japan. I help lead the corporate venture arm where we do direct and fund of fund investments.Our direct investments include Grab (Ridehailing, largest startup in SEA), where we helped to build its Finance business unit, Shopback (Softbank/Temasek-backed), and other industry leaders. Our LP investments include some of the top-performing funds in SEA (East Ventures, Beenext), and global funds like Quona Capital and Better Tomorrow Ventures.Reach out to me to share more about your venture!
experience.description_html: Credit Saison is a Tokyo-listed 30b AUM consumer finance company, and one of the largest credit card issuers in Japan. I help lead the corporate venture arm where we do direct and fund of fund investments.Our direct investments include Grab (Ridehailing, largest startup in SEA), where we helped to build its Finance business unit, Shopback (Softbank/Temasek-backed), and other industry leaders. Our LP investments include some of the top-performing funds in SEA (East Ventures, Beenext), and global funds like Quona Capital and Better Tomorrow Ventures.Reach out to me to share more about your venture!

experience.title: Co-Founder & VP - Strategic Partnerships
experience.description: Building an AI/ML powered software to onboard into car dashboard cameras, using driving behaviour to customize insurance policies.
